ValidationRule.description: Campaign Code 10 digits must align with 9 digits on Master campaign
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT (OR (Contains(RecordType.Name, 'Master Campaign'), RecordType.Name = "Commercial", RecordType.Name = "Dummy Campaign")), LEFT(RTL_Campaign_Code_10_digits__c , 9) <> Parent.RTL_Campaign_Code_9_digits__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Child campaign code mismatch with the Master campaign code.
